item.description: 这是一条突发新闻。全面报道将很快发布。【原文：This is a breaking news story. Full coverage will be available soon.】

item.title: 诺华与 Monte Rosa Therapeutics 签订价值 57 亿美元的许可协议
item.description: 瑞士制药商诺华与药物开发商 Monte Rosa Therapeutics 周一签署了一项价值高达 57 亿美元的许可协议，共同开发治疗免疫介导疾病的药物。【原文：Swiss drugmaker Novartis and drug developer Monte Rosa Therapeutics signed a licensing deal worth up to $5.7 billion on Monday to develop drugs for immune-mediated diseases.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司因燃料成本影响，第三季度利润低于预期
item.description: 美国阿拉斯加航空公司（Alaska Air）周一表示，由于高燃油成本和运营挑战对利润率造成压力，该公司预计其季度利润将处于此前预期的低端。【原文：Alaska Air expects its quarterly profit to be at the low end of its previous forecast, as high fuel costs and operational challenges weigh on margins, the U.S. carrier said on Monday.】

item.title: 大卫-埃里森努力重建派拉蒙的内容大山
item.description: 在公司与派拉蒙的合并于今年 8 月结束后数小时，首席执行官大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）就开始了他的帝国建设。【原文：Hours after his company's merger with Paramount closed in August, CEO David Ellison's empire-building kicked into gear.】

item.title: 印度和美国将于周二在新德里举行贸易谈判
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对南亚国家的出口产品征收惩罚性关税数周后，印度和美国将于周二在新德里举行贸易谈判。【原文：India and the United States will hold trade talks in New Delhi on Tuesday, weeks after President Donald Trump imposed punitive tariffs on the South Asian nation's exports, slowing its overall shipments to a nine-month low in August.】

item.title: EchoStar 预计在出售频谱和偿还债务后将拥有 240 亿美元现金
item.description: EchoStar 周一表示，在利用频谱许可证销售收入偿还债务、增强资产负债表并支持无线、卫星和技术领域的增长后，预计将持有 241 亿美元的现金总额。【原文：EchoStar said on Monday it expects to hold $24.1 billion in total cash after using proceeds from its spectrum license sales to repay debt, bolstering its balance sheet and supporting growth in wireless, satellite and technology sectors.】

item.title: 解释：韩国为何不能与日本达成同样的美国贸易协议
item.description: 韩国与美国就降低关税的贸易协议进行的谈判陷入了僵局，原因是人们担心 3,500 亿美元投资基金的外汇影响，该基金是 7 月份与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普达成的协议的一部分。【原文：South Korea's negotiations with the U.S. on a trade deal to lower tariffs have stalled amid concerns over the foreign exchange implications of a $350 billion investment fund, part of an agreement reached with President Donald Trump in July.】

item.title: 美联储周开始
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 印度市场监管部门批准 Pine Labs 首次公开募股
item.description: 印度市场监管部门已批准金融科技公司 Pine Labs 的首次公开募股，其网站上的一份文件显示，该公司已于周一上市。【原文：India's markets regulator has approved the initial public offering of fintech firm Pine Labs , a document on its website showed on Monday.】

item.title: 英特尔下调全年支出目标
item.description: 英特尔公司周一表示，已将 2025 年全年调整后运营支出目标从之前的 170 亿美元下调至 168 亿美元，以反映其可编程芯片业务 Altera 的去合并化。【原文：Intel said on Monday it has lowered its full-year 2025 adjusted operating expense target to $16.8 billion, from $17 billion earlier, to reflect the deconsolidation of its programmable chip business, Altera.】

item.title: 美联储会议周伊始，华尔街期货走势低迷
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货走势平淡，为本周美联储恢复降息周期拉开了序幕。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were muted on Monday, kicking off a week where the Federal Reserve is expected to resume its interest rate cutting cycle.】

item.title: 遏制数十亿过度捕捞补贴的协议在世贸组织生效
item.description: 世界贸易组织表示，一项旨在遏制导致过度捕捞的数十亿美元补贴的具有里程碑意义的协议已于周一生效，活动人士称赞此举是朝着帮助全球鱼类种群恢复迈出的一步。【原文：A landmark agreement to curb billions of dollars in subsidies contributing to overfishing came into force on Monday, the World Trade Organization said - a move activists hailed as a step towards helping global fish stocks recover.】

item.title: 如果无法达成资产剥离协议，美国准备禁用 TikTok
item.description: 一位了解在马德里举行的一轮会谈的美国政府官员周一告诉记者，如果中国公司Bytedance无法就撤资达成协议，美国政府准备让对社交媒体应用TikTok的禁令继续生效。【原文：The U.S. government is ready to let the ban on social media app TikTok go ahead if a deal on divesture by Chinese company Bytedance cannot be reached, a U.S. government official, who has knowledge of a round of talks held in Madrid, told reporters on Monday.】

item.title: 随着出售听证会的开始，Citgo 母公司的拍卖接近最后阶段
item.description: 一场期待已久的拍卖听证会将于周一开始，预计将完成美国法院组织的对委内瑞拉拥有的美国炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 母公司股份的拍卖。【原文：A long-awaited sale hearing expected to complete a U.S. court-organized auction of shares in the parent of Venezuela-owned U.S. refiner Citgo Petroleum is set to begin on Monday, with bidders and creditors locked in a bitter dispute over who should win.】

item.title: 独家报道法国威胁在欧盟监管斗争中阻止加密货币许可证 "护照化
item.description: 法国金融监管机构负责人告诉路透社，法国已经警告说，它可能会试图阻止一些在其他欧盟国家获得许可的加密货币公司在国内运营，以此推动将监督权移交给该集团的中央证券监管机构。【原文：France has warned it may try to block some crypto firms licenced in other EU countries from operating domestically as part of a push to get oversight transferred to the bloc’s central securities regulator, the head of its financial watchdog told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国指责美国 "恃强凌弱"，推动对俄罗斯石油采购征收关税
item.description: 中国指责美国 "单边霸凌"，呼吁盟国因中国购买俄罗斯石油而对中国征收关税，这加剧了中美两国官员在西班牙举行会议试图解决贸易争端之际的紧张局势。【原文：China accused the United States of "unilateral bullying" in calling on allies to impose tariffs on China over its purchase of Russian oil, fueling tensions as Chinese and U.S officials meet in Spain to try to resolve trade disputes.】

item.title: 尽管受到制裁，美国和欧洲仍与俄罗斯有数十亿美元的贸易往来
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周六表示，美国准备对俄罗斯实施新的能源制裁，但前提是所有北约国家停止购买俄罗斯石油并实施类似措施。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Saturday that the United States was prepared to impose fresh energy sanctions on Russia, but only if all NATO nations ceased purchasing Russian oil and implemented similar measures.】

item.title: 中国称初步调查显示英伟达违反反垄断法
item.description: 中国市场监管部门周一表示，初步调查发现，美国芯片巨头英伟达（Nvidia）违反了中国的反垄断法。【原文：China's market regulator on Monday said that a preliminary investigation had found that U.S. chip giant Nvidia had violated the country's anti-monopoly law.】

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所集团为私募基金推出基于区块链的平台
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团（London Stock Exchange Group）周一表示，随着该数据和分析集团不断扩大其产品范围，其为私募基金推出的基于区块链的基础设施平台已经完成了首笔交易。【原文：The London Stock Exchange Group said on Monday that it has made its first transaction on a blockchain-based infrastructure platform it has launched for private funds as the data and analytics group expands its offerings.】

item.title: 斯沃琪首席执行官表示，关税之后斯沃琪将在美国提价
item.description: 斯沃琪首席执行官尼克-海耶克（Nick Hayek）在接受报纸采访时表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）上个月对瑞士征收 39% 的关税后，斯沃琪将在美国提价 5%-15%。【原文：Swatch will hike its prices in the United States by between 5% and 15% after the 39% tariff President Donald Trump imposed on Switzerland last month, the Swiss watchmaker's Chief Executive Nick Hayek said in a newspaper interview.】

item.title: 独家报道用小麦换中国汽车？俄罗斯转向易货贸易规避制裁
item.description: 自 20 世纪 90 年代以来，老式的易货贸易首次在俄罗斯的对外贸易中兴起，一些公司为了躲避西方制裁，用小麦换中国汽车，用亚麻籽换建筑材料。【原文：Old-fashioned barter is on the rise in Russia's foreign trade for the first time since the 1990s, as companies seeking to outfox Western sanctions swap wheat for Chinese cars and flax seeds for building materials.】

item.title: 英国央行将缩减量化宽松政策，保持利率稳定
item.description: 随着债券市场波动加剧，英格兰银行本周似乎将放慢每年减持 1,000 亿英镑政府债券的步伐，同时维持主要利率不变。【原文：The Bank of England looks set this week to slow the 100 billion-pound-a-year pace at which it reduces its government bond holdings following increased volatility in bond markets, while keeping its main interest rate on hold.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，美国证券交易委员会将在采取行动前向企业通报技术违规行为
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周一发表的一篇采访报道，美国证券交易委员会主席保罗-阿特金斯（Paul Atkins）誓言，在 "敲开企业大门 "之前，将向企业发出技术违规通知，这标志着美国证券交易委员会不再采取激进的执法行动。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission Chairman Paul Atkins vowed to give businesses notice of technical violations before "bashing down their door", marking a shift away from aggressive enforcement actions, according to a Financial Times interview published on Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚金融业工会寻求干预澳新银行裁员 3500 人的计划
item.description: 澳大利亚金融业工会周一表示，它正在向公平工作委员会提出争议，要求对澳新银行集团裁员 3500 人的计划进行紧急干预，理由是与受影响工人的协商不足。【原文：Australia's Finance Sector Union said on Monday it was filing a dispute with the Fair Work Commission, seeking urgent intervention over ANZ Group's plans to cut 3,500 jobs, citing inadequate consultation with affected workers.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的 "星链 "公司报告服务中断，数千用户受到影响
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的卫星互联网服务公司 Starlink 周一在其网站上发布消息称，该公司正在经历一次服务中断。【原文：Elon Musk's satellite internet service Starlink is experiencing a service outage, according to a message on its website on Monday.】

item.title: 必和必拓标榜铜矿有机增长和美国诱惑，对大型收购保持沉默
item.description: 全球最大的矿业公司必和必拓（BHP）周一向股东介绍了公司的铜矿开采潜力，并强调了美国的投资吸引力，但对重大收购的前景保持沉默。【原文：The world's biggest mining company, BHP , touted its solid copper potential and flagged the investment appeal of the United States on Monday, but was silent on the prospect of major buyouts, as top executives briefed shareholders.】

item.title: 早间竞价本周关注各国央行
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter】

item.title: 中美在马德里就贸易和 TikTok 举行会谈，会谈进入第二天
item.description: 周一，中美两国代表团将继续在马德里举行第二天的会谈，讨论贸易紧张局势和中国即将从短视频应用TikTok撤资的最后期限。【原文：Delegations from the U.S. and China were set to continue their talks in Madrid into a second day on Monday over trade tensions and an imminent deadline for Chinese divestment from the short-video app TikTok.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪表示将 "积极响应 "供应商付款倡议
item.description: 中国比亚迪周一表示，该公司将积极响应一项行业倡议，该倡议详细规定了汽车制造商向供应商及时付款的规则，比亚迪将与其他公司一道响应政府反对价格战的号召。【原文：China's BYD said on Monday it would actively respond to an industry initiative that fleshes out rules on automakers making timely payments to suppliers, joining others in complying with a government call against price wars.】

item.title: 澳新银行因违规被罚 1.6 亿美元，这是一系列失误中的最新一起
item.description: 澳大利亚澳新银行（ANZ）周一同意支付创纪录的 2.4 亿澳元（1.595 亿美元）罚金，原因是该银行存在系统性失误，包括在政府债券交易中 "不合情理地 "行事，以及向死亡客户收费。【原文：Australian bank ANZ agreed on Monday to pay a record-breaking A$240 million ($159.5 million) in fines for systemic failures ranging from acting "unconscionably" in a government bond deal to charging dead customers.】
